title: Shiloh National Military Park: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       The laws enforced at Shiloh National Miltary Park are contained in the documents below. Federal regulations covering all National Park Service lands are contained in the Code of Federal Regulations, Title 36, Chapter 1, also known as 36 CFR. In addition, regulations pertaining specifically to Shiloh National Military Park are contained in the park's Superintendent's Compendium of Regulations.  Laws and policies regarding firearms can be located on the firearms policy page.
